long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
My Tabs Save : Quick Tab+
Save multiple(several) open tabs for reducing system memory so that browser and system can run fast and smoothly


Listing All Open Tabs
  - Open Loaded Tabs
    - Listing Open Loaded(Active) Tabs 
  - Open Unloaded Tabs
    - Listing Unloaded(Inactive) Tabs
  - Saved Tabs
    - Listing Tabs, Those are saved
    
Listing all tabs with Title so that you can open exact tab. You don't have to go through all tabs for looking particular tab. Mostly when we open browser next time with multiple tabs then we have to face open particular tab, for that we look tab one by one which take time and loading tabs again as well as reducing internet speed. 

Also this extension give you list of open tabs so that you can know about open multiple tabs.  

Themes
 - There are three themes(Classic, Dark and Yellow). Where can change according to as you like.

 - Change Theme Option
 - Listing open Tabs
 - Listing tabs with Title
 - Quick/Switch tab by click
 - Notification On/Off of Save Tab
